contexts.context: ...watching the valley for intruders. Vanis was known to be <mark>faster</mark> than the wind, a warrior who could thrash his opponents...
...brother, Horis, stood guard. Horis, who was <mark>faster</mark> than his brother Vanis, stronger than his brother Feryn,...
...with all humility, I would say that no one is <mark>faster</mark> on their feet than our troupe, but Master Neloth's guards...
..., Alteration, Destruction and Enchanting - can expect to advance <mark>faster</mark> and higher in the ranks.
